fields.title: Every Web is a Home
fields.description: Game developed for Global Game Jam 2019 in which you are a spider trying to catch bugs with your web.

fields.title: Github Pie Chart
fields.description: A script that generates a pie chart with the lines of code percentage of each language of a GitHub profile.

fields.title: Project Watt
fields.description: A platforming game themed around an electric particle in a circuit trying to reach the exit (connect to earth) and developed for MINIX.

fields.title: Teacher Bot
fields.description: A Discord bot that retrieves statistics for a text channel and has a bunch of other funny commands.

fields.title: CTM 2020 Summer Internship
fields.description: Flying communications node controller sensitive to traffic

fields.title: Pokémon Origins
fields.description: An infographics on pokémon and its counterpart inspirational origins in flora and fauna.

fields.title: Pokémon - A Sequel Coming In Inevitably
fields.description: Pokémon Fire Red look-alike running on a terminal.

fields.title: McDelivery
fields.description: WebGL scene redemption of a McDonald's zeppelin delivering hamburgers.

fields.title: Tour Mate App
fields.description: An application that let's you plan a tour around Porto by choosing several touristic attractions and calculating an optimal route to let you visit them.

fields.title: Oblivion Visual Studio Code Theme
fields.description: A syntax coloring theme for Visual Studio Code based on the already existing Oblivion.

fields.title: String Art
fields.description: A simple string art generator that converts an input black and white illustration_url into a sequence of connected strings in a circular frame.

fields.title: Ask Away
fields.description: Mobile applications to ask questions in conference talks.

fields.title: Umbrella
fields.description: Game developed for Global Game Jam 2021.
